data.convo: I ’ m sure it will be wet when we arrive . Yes . I dare say it will be . It will be Sunday so I expected everything will be closed . No . I don ’ t think that ’ s possible . Some places are sure to be open . But the bank should be closed so we shouldn't to be able to get any money . Mmm , you may be right . Do you think we ’ ll need our overcoats ? No . We couldn ’ t possibly . Why not ? It will be summer . So it will be hot . Is that very likely in England ? Yes . It could happen .
